name: 5by5 | The Big Web Show #186: Tantek Çelik—web standards, toolchains, and the decentralized web on Huffduffer
summary: Legendary computer scientist, web standards pioneer, and indie-web proponent Tantek Çelik is Jeffrey Zeldman’s guest.    The secret history of standards in our web browsers. How web standards moved from academic ideas that sometimes couldn’t even be ...
